# `expand_feature_info`

expand_feature_info


## Description

low level function to expand feature coordinates


## Usage

```r
expand_feature_info(
  spatial_feat_info,
  expand_counts = FALSE,
  count_info_column = "count",
  jitter = c(0, 0),
  verbose = TRUE
)
```


## Value

data.table
